title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Browns Head-Scratcher, Gruden/Urban Fallout, Cowboys Optimism with Matt Mosley
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Browns Head-Scratcher, Gruden/Urban Fallout, Cowboys Optimism with Matt Mosley
description:
Colin reacts to a crazy NFL Week 5 including the head-scratching end to the Browns/Chargers game and Baker's questionable choices (3:00), why the Panthers billionaire owner could quickly lose patience Sam Darnold' (7:00), and how the fallout from Urban Meyer and Jon Gruden's public scandals bled onto the field (8:00). Then, longtime Dallas Cowboys writer - and host of The Doomsday Podcast - Matt Mosley and Colin discuss if this looks like the best Dallas team in a decade (12:00), re-evaluating the Cowboys' previous four games (16:00), the surprising star on the defense (19:00), what Mike McCarthy has done differently than Jason Garrett (23:00), how Jerry has made some difficult personnel decisions that have paid off (28:00), their reaction to Sunday's blowout of the Giants (33:00), why this Cowboys run seems less "fraudulent" than others (34:00).

Make sure you follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
